TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_P’anoh, title = P’anoh, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/P’anoh} }

S.FORM: P'anoh Itiniay i Nanzhuang Cen no Miaoli ko P'anoh a niyaro', 48 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 155 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 147 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 8 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal83%, Saysiyat8%, Amis1%, Paiwan1%, Bunun1%, Seediq1%, roma1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

P'anoh Itiniay i Nanzhoang Cen no Miaoli ko P'anoh a niyaro', 48 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 155 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 147 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 8 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal83%, Saysiyat8%, Amis1%, Paiwan1%, Bonon1%, Seediq1%, roma1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
